website_summaries.verdict: This small, yet powerful vacuum can tackle all types of floors and even powers through pet hair.
pros: Will not lose suction over time
Change settings from carpet to hard floors on the handle
Easy to empty the dirt cup
Stair tool and brush tool included
Sucks up hair without it getting tangled
cons: This is a small vacuum, so it's not ideal for cleaning large houses

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum for 4 years and it’s been nothing but a disappointment. Pieces of it have literally fallen off, the bare floor setting no longer works, and it always tips over. If you are going to spend good money in a vaccume that will last do not buy this one. If I knew now how poor quality this was I never would have bought it. I have a 14 year old Dyson that still works great. Quality most definitely has declined over the years.
customer_reviews.author: LaF

customer_reviews.title: Almost like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for my finished (carpeted) basement. I like everything about it, but it only has one (1) tube to it, making it quite short for me at 5'7" and husband at 6'2"; to use this vacuum as a 'regular' vacuum. It works well- to carry around to dust & do steps - and it IS lightweight. Just am unhappy with the floor vacuuming. My helper is shorter and I doubt if she even noticed the height.
customer_reviews.author: Angel E

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum less than a year and it is already falling apart. The trigger has been replaced once, it just stopped working, and to get that replaced took jumping through so many hoops even though it comes with a 5 year warranty. I have never been so disappointed with a purchase. It's Dyson it's supposed to last! And this customer service was just horrible. Oh and the replacement trigger head broke again. I have bought a new vacuum. The Dyson feels and works cheaply. Do not waste your money. The design is so awkward and bulky as well. I just have not been so disappointed before.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Defective trigger power head
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson’s trigger handle is defective. Every time I try to engage the power head it doesn’t work & it flings the debris all over & doesn’t pick it up. When I take the power head complete off the suction works fine. As soon as I put the power head on it doesn’t work. I have owned a stand up Dyson for many years without a problem....& the reason I bought this model was it could go under beds etc. It’s poorly constructed compared to the stand up model. It’s now too late to send it back....but lesson learned, I’ll never buy another Dyson product. For the money it’s not worth it in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: works great..........when it's runnigg
customer_reviews.text: we bought this vac 3 years ago after being tired of replacing a vac every year or two. in theory, it works great. our problem is that it overheats and shuts off after about 30 minutes, less in some instances. we clean the filter, empty it after every use, and don't pick up anything damp or bigger than a dead leaf. no crumpled tissues, talcum powder, etc. so...for over $400 shouldn't a vacuum cleaner , well, vacuum for longer than a few minutes? just how tempermental is a vac suppossed to be?
customer_reviews.author: Midnitesurfer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a sweeper with suction!
customer_reviews.text: I luv this dyson canister vacuum. Great design, although the attachment hose could be more durable. It will flex if too much pressure applied while using. However, it's still a great unit and the price was just to good to pass up. I actually purchased via Macy's and then later that day Amazon price lowered by $30 and zero tax! Needless to say I cancelled Macy's order which hasn't been an easy task since I'm still working on the return credit even as I write review. FYI- if you purchase from Macy's online be sure it's what you really want. Canceling a web purchase via Macys is a huge hassle and requires a great deal of patiences.
customer_reviews.author: iCastle

customer_reviews.title: No manufacture warranty for this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my fifth Dyson and worst one. Suction power did not last like my first DC39 I have purchased when Dyson originally introduced to the market. And this did not last even a year and half. Contacted Dyson and was told that there is no manufacture warranty since I did not purchase THEIR authorized dealer. Wow ....Dyson no longer has any pride to the product they have manufactured. I was speechless. This would be my very last Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Strongest pet hair removal!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this Dyson canister. I was tired of always taking apart upright vacuum cleaners. Picks up all pet hair, stong suction. Rugs look new again No more allergies. Strongly recommend for pet hair removal
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of vacuums before choosing this one. It is delightfully lightweight, it DOES make those turns easily and efficiently, you will never have to buy vacuum cleaner bags again, and the added tools are very easy to take on and off. Stringy stuff does get caught in the floor piece in the rotating whisker floor piece. It has some small fragile plastic pieces so I am hoping that they won't break with use. Make sure that when you empty the dust bin, you do so when there isn't a wind, because it will blow in your face and all over your pants. Good luck to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Merrimack Maiden

customer_reviews.title: Dyson has drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pulled more dirt out of the carpet that I never knew was there. However, there is no place to carry accessories and there is no permanenet button to shut off the floor brush when you go to bare floors. You have to keep your finger on the button so the brush does not turn. Plus there is no on-off swith on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pulvino

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I've had Dyson uprights, so I looked forward to getting this canister now that we live in a house with all hardwood and tile floors. It does an excellent job on my floors, although I don't use the tool that it came with - I use the "flat out" tool instead because it does a much better job of getting under things. I love how easily it rolls around behind me without smashing into the back of my legs like the old ones used to. Am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone with a home with hardwood and tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: muttandjeeps

customer_reviews.title: My New Dyson DC39 - user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This canister vacuum replaced the original Dyson canister DC21 that I purchased from Linens and Things. It was a cumbersome and heavy beast but worked outrageously well. This new DC 39 canister is a dream. It's a Dyson in every respect but the re engineering makes the entire unit lighter, easy to maneuver and a joy to use. It's a great upgrade from the original canister and I am glad I purchased it. No longer do I have struggle and stop to change heads because of different floor surfaces. Dyson finally made a user friendly canister.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought This Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided on this Dyson model! I clean houses for a living, so I wanted something powerful but lightweight. The DC39 is both, and it's easier to detach the hose wand for edges than the stand-up models. The design is really cool, with the big ball serving as the vacuum's base. Also, I really like that the rotating brush is narrower than most other canister models, making it easier to get under smaller areas like end tables and behind couches. I highly recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: high quality vacuum
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this for 6 years now. Works great. I need to vacuum more frequently, but when I do, this machine works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Surprising amount of power for the noise
customer_reviews.text: It sucks harder than it sounds! We were pleasantly surprised when we turned it on for the first time; It sounded pretty weak as we were used to the typical Eureka bag vacuum that roars like a V8. This one sounded like a high rpm Yamaha motorcycle engine, a bit whizzy, which gave me the false impression that it's low on grunt. It sucked like a champ though. It went through everything we had on the plush area rugs, our floor, our pellet stove ash tray with nary a whimper. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Dragooi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the noise and suction because some of reviews complained about. But it works great with my wood floor after two weeks' use. I am happy with the result. Sometime I mop (wet swiffer) after vacuum and the white didn't look very dirty. Also the noise is not that bad especially I stopped the rotating brush in the head for the floor. Now I am just using the vacuum but bot mop most time. The amzon customer service is also very good. They responsed me very quickly and helped me fix the delivery problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dyson product. I am really pleased with the purchase. The unit containing the dirt bag is easy to move (drag) around. The actual cleaner is very light weight and easy to maneuver (easy to get dust under beds and in corners). I had to watch a few videos online to learn how to empty the dust bucket (very easy to learn).
customer_reviews.author: thinkingmd

customer_reviews.title: Dyson vacuum
customer_reviews.text: When I first used it I thought this was a CHEAP PLASTIC thing - I WAS WRONG !!!! It is just wonderful with super STRONG construction and especially SUPER STRONG SUCTION POWER !!!! I love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing vacuum. I have mostly hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing vacuum. I have mostly hard surfaces, with a few large area rugs. This sucks up so much dirt and hair, it delights me. I was horrified at the amount of debris in the canister after using it for the first time on our low-pile area rug. It is easy to put together and use, and beautifully designed. The only drawback is that is has so much powerful suction that its hard to use on small area rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it five stars is because I could not give it six. Lightweight wand, great power and mobility around home. Easy to assemble and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Multi Floor Vacuum Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have spent lots of money of vacuums in the past but this is the best money that I have spent. I have had this vacuum for 3 months and I love it. It's light weight and has great suction power. It's amazing the dirt that it gets up even when the floor doesn't even look dirty. It's easy to empty the dirt out into the trash can. I have half hardwood flooring and half carpet and it goes easily from one floor to the other. The compact head makes it easy to get around tight corners. The cord retraction is wonderful. I would highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Haney92

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is by far the worse one I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to use, heavy and does not “follow”you around easily. The suction is horrible and you can’t easily switch from rug to floor. There are no instructions whatsoever and the machine is difficult to put together and use. I hate it. A true waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love my dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dyson and I absolutely love it!!! It's light weight bar and attachments make it easy to vacuum and I love the slim beater bar for carpets which allows me to get under furniture, in corners, and really do an excellent job. It's actually nice to vacuum because I love that I can see how much it has picked up and it's amazing how much it picks up!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Over hyped product - save your money and buy something cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a better capacity to the tank. The head keeps jamming and the connection between the top handle and the bottom hose keeps undoing. Not worth $400. Now after 1 1/2 years, it no longer works. The motor runs, but the suction is so weak that it is completely useless. How can I get this fixed?????
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneWithHighExpectations

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Read some positive reviews on this model so decided to take advantage of a super price Amazon had recently posted.My wife and I prefer canister type vacuum cleaners over the uprights which seem more bulky.The machine is pretty quiet for a vacuum cleaner and is easy to maneuvre around our furniture.It looks and feels solidly built and I would expect it to outlast it's 5 year warranty.At this point we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: FIGJAM

customer_reviews.title: We own the upright, chargeable and the DC39 Dyson ...
customer_reviews.text: We own the upright, chargeable and the DC39 Dyson. If I could do it all over again I would just buy the DC39, it is the most versatile of the three.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A DEAL ON THIS VACUUM CLEANER . THIS MACHINE LISTED FOR AS HIGH AS $500.00 . I GOT IT FOR $295.00 . I LIKE THE WAY IT CLEANS . IT'S A LITTLE DIFFERENT FROM MY OLD DYSON DC21 WHICH WAS A GREAT VACUUM CLEANER BUT THIS ONE IS JUST AS GOOD WITH ALITTLE STRONGER SUCTION .
customer_reviews.author: cball002

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Love how the wand on this lets me get under furniture that I'd have to move around before. Seriously. I can vacuum under my entertainment center with this! Suction is awesome. Expensive but quality ain't cheap. This does not make vacuuming "fun" as some have suggested. This is due to the fact that vacuuming is not fun.
customer_reviews.author: CodecMan

customer_reviews.title: No beg is the way i like
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum cleaner no need to worry about changing bags again. I have it for a month need to empty it pretty often. It moves smooth and easy. It has excellent suction. Feels powerful Cons are: is noisy compare to my old vacuum. Can't stand it on a site to save space while storing .
customer_reviews.author: Luk

customer_reviews.title: works, but feels like toy..updated
customer_reviews.text: picks up dirt well however the plastic is lightweight and the head skips over rugs with short nap on hardwood floors. There is no way to 'turn down' the suction to vacuum throw rugs. hose is not long enough, neither is cord. used for just over a year and the head now won't stay attached to the wand. completely not worth the price. buy a cheap eureka.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: amazing sucking power
customer_reviews.text: That's why I got it and it didn't disappoint. Looks like a spaceship. Reasonably durable and light with a good long hose and extension. But the real thing is it can suck. Almost anything else you can work around, but if your vacuum doesn't have power then...
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey A Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: We like this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of them, one for us and one for our daughter. Both are working great. Ours replaces a Kirby G4 that was a beast and this is much much better. Our daughter has two shedding pets and needed to have something that handles pet hair. She reports that it works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: st ruell

customer_reviews.title: Why did we wait so long!
customer_reviews.text: Its a game changer. Light, easy to use and flexible. Emptying the cannister and clearing the brush couldn't be easier. We have a small urban apartment with scatter rugs and hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum has worked very well until two weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has worked very well until two weeks ago. It started to emit a metal type smell and loose suction. Turns out the motor is shot. Trying to get Dyson to deal with it as it's only 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacumn ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacumn we ever had.....way better than the Oreck it replaced.....easy to manuever,measy to clean, ultra powerful
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lounsbury

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Vacuum! Everything the commercials say. Best Vacuum I ever owned. The only difference between this one and the DC39 Animal is ... Color And Pet Attachment
customer_reviews.author: David Rider

customer_reviews.title: It's got my vote!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cord retractor. I keep this one upstairs to do the bedrooms. It's a Dyson so it sucks like crazy and is easy to manipulate under beds, etc. The only down side is it's a little more difficult to clean out than DC28 which I use downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN MISIEWICZ

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC39 Multi floor canister vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than our old vacuum cleaner. Slightly bigger looking in person than in the pictures but still quite compact. Works VERY well.
customer_reviews.author: CT0123

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to all the hype
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on lots of machines before making my purchase and this one is living up to all the hype. Just do it. It's worth the money. The amount of stuff my old vacuum was leaving was incredible. My carpets are fluffy again! Thank you Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Darian Graff

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Canister Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: By far the best vacuum I ever owned. Very lightweight and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: S A Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Dyson DC39 Multi floor canister vacuum cleaner Dyson; really works for different floor. And excellent service . Deliver in time in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lilaz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Sears sweepers for 50 years and this machine blows them all away!! The order arrived a way faster than I planned. I ran this machine on my whole carpeted house and it was amazing the material it picked up. I had just run my sears and it was amazing what it had left behind!! It is so light while operating I was not the least bit tired when fininshed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: How did I love this long without a dyson?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. Glides so nice on hard floors and pivots amazingly. Super long cord means I don't have to unplug it and the retractable cord is awesome!!! It also cleans carpets way better than out central VAC. Ohh and I love that it sucks dog hair up before it even reaches it on the floor. Amazing suction!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Reese

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: I am, or at least I thought I was a very good housekeeper, that was until I got my new Dyson DC39. I am embarrassed to tell you how much dirt came out of my dining room rug. At least now, my house is clean enough for a baby to crawl on the floor. Thank you Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: I HATE that the brush stops turning so frequently
customer_reviews.text: I HATE that the brush stops turning so frequently. A Lego can completely stop the function. Vacuuming a rug can take 15 minutes turning on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you have multiple surfaces to vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy if you have multiple surfaces to vacuum. The turbine heads keep getting screwed up. I have had my fourth Dyson replaced by Amazon now..... Great service yet the turbine heads are poor quality. The canister and the machine are great though
customer_reviews.author: maarten

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great vac cost a ton and why didn't they put the on/off on the handle?
customer_reviews.author: flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great mobility, great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has exceeded our expectations. It is so easy to use and moves around all types of floors with ease. It is our second dyson and these things are work horses, we have two dogs that shed hair like crazy, have had other vacuums break down from the hair in less than a year. Not the dysons, our first one is 8 yrs old and it still works like new. These machines are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Trn77

customer_reviews.title: Great Power
customer_reviews.text: It has such a strong suction, yet quiet - for the power anyways. In fact, it is so strong that often I have to use the release lever because it sucks up everything. The thing to hold the wand on the body is a bit difficult to use and that's about the only complaint I have with this machine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yuji Utsumi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and yet has good suction, even my 7 year old daughter has no problem using it. so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Martin

customer_reviews.title: DYSON DC39 REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE PICK OF DOG HAIR. ONLY COMPLAINT IT IS CLUMSY TO MANOUVER AROUND. ALSO I WISH THE ELECTRIC CORD WAS 50 FEET.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not as pleased with this as other vacuums I have had that cost far less.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen G.

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It's suction is so strong it literally lifts up my indoor/outdoor carpeting! I can't get over how much dirt it picked up after I vacuumed with the upright I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Deaf Tirzah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size the ease of use and how well it works. My wife does prefer the upright over the canister that is why I gave it a 4
customer_reviews.author: Percy R Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Cannister
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have more flexibility when I have to clean steps and dust furniture. It is great. It is light enough to hold and dust with the dusting attachment. I cleaned three rooms very quickly with the dusting tool. It is a bit heavy, but well worth the time saved. I used it to do steps and I have never been able to get the back of the steps and close to the crevice like I can with the canister. It moves around easily and works find for my purposes. I have an upright Dyson for the floors, but the suction is so strong I think it would do the floors well too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: the best vacuum I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It works so well and it is so quiet and easy to use. I'm definitely very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaroslaw J Ostapowicz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, although price is not justfied
customer_reviews.text: After reading many online reviews, i bought this from amazon black friday sale for 25% discount, and so far its working fine. But the price is definitely not justified. The product manual is too terse and disappointing, and even with extension pole there is considerable bending while vacuuming. Although I like it to some extent, dragging this vaccum is getting to be a pain. I like the way the electrical cord get sucked into the unit on a simple push of a button. Its not noisy (but not too quiet either). I recommend this only if there is 25% or $100 discount. I will amend this review once i get to cleaning and so more rugged use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my daughter, as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter, I had one and loved it, so she was needing a sweeper, so I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I replaced by Dyson DC 28 with this canister vac. The power head really seems a bit weak; however, that being said, it does suck up a lot of dirt. It just seems a bit flimsy. I absolutely hated the DC 28 - the head is so big that you can't get under anything and it is very heavy. The DC 39 is light weight and you can go under a lot of stuff! I love that part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on an excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very easy to use and the quality of the cleaning is excellent. It was advertised as new in a damaged box and that is exactly what it was - and I had no intention of keeping the box!!
customer_reviews.author: annz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! It is so light and easy to maneuver. Very strong suction.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ettere

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Light weight, quieter than most, and picks up everything, including pet hair like no other I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The DC39 is all it claims to be. Great cleaning, light in weight and very flexible getting around, and under furniture. Worth the extra money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: We have a super shag and this baby does a wonderful job
customer_reviews.text: We have a super shag and this baby does a wonderful job. Makes us wonder where all the stuff comes from
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ryba

customer_reviews.title: Little big vacume
customer_reviews.text: This one is lighter than the old models but still same great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Iraz

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum arrived quickly and was just as described. I'm thrilled with its suction power, light weight and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacumn
customer_reviews.text: I like the manuverablity of this vacumn, works well for me on hardwood flooring as well as carpet and is so light weight compared to other brands I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable performer
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long while since I purchased this vacuum. The vacuum is still functioning although it is clearly slowing down and needs more frequent cleaning. The cord retraction is slowing down and the heads are starting to wear out. It has been heavily used a ton in cleaning up a wide variety of things over the course of its two year life. We've used pick up everything ranging from leaves to dog hair. I would get another one of these or a similar model in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb McGary

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a year before posting a review on this product. It wasn't that I didn't love it from the start but I wanted to make sure it would stand up to the usage. I have purchased several vacuums from other companies that just failed to perform after just a few months. We have been using this Dyson for 15 months and it still works as well as the day we got it.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I've had quite a few brands of vacuums over the last forty years and this is a top 10. It's easy to use and has great suction. Dyson is really worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good power and cleaning however could be constructed a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McEntee

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum for my 800 sq feet condo with carpet. I started using it 2 weeks ago and I'm impress with the vacuum results, it sucks everything!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Buying this Dyson was the best decision we ever made! It picks up dust that has probably been sitting in our carpet for the entire four years we've been living in our place. Great on wall to wall carpet and rugs. We're thoroughly pleased. I only take off one star because it doesn't do the job for me. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My Dyson DC39 Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is small but it is a great cleaner even for pet hair. I have 2 dogs and they shed a lot, but my Dyson does a good job for me in picking the hair up. Also it handles very well for people who have arthiritis.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Williams

customer_reviews.title: Model DC 39
customer_reviews.text: Great vac. Wish I would have bought one sooner. We love it. It is ligh t weight and the cord does't get in the way as much.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Gammon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does what it claims to do. I treat my carpet with a fine powder every 3 months. This vacuum does a great job of getting it up. Very easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the canister type vacuum because my wife has some back issues, and this is much easier to move around and suprizingly light weight
customer_reviews.author: kevin d stephens

customer_reviews.title: Dysons customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is lower than the upright vacuum. The Triggerhead tool-the settings that lets you clean carpets vs hardwood floors NEVER WORKS! beware. Dysons customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Kuthyar

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased and satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Happy to give the highest rating possible to our new Dyson DC39 floor canister vacuum cleaner. It's hard to believe it can pick up so much dirt at each use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum head is not working after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Head not working. My housekeeper liked it until it quit. So frustrating! Need to call factory and see options to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cowchic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I expected. Excellent vacuum and light weight. Amazing capabilities. You can actually feel the difference in the way the carpet feels. Shipped extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dena K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy!! This vacuum started out well. Six months later it's not working! And may or may not be covered by the warranty. A $450 vacuum should NOT stop working after six months. And customer service said it could be wear and tear. Seriously, I use the vacuum twice a week, have no pets and mostly hardwood floors. I always empty the canister and wash the filter?! What wear and tear?!! How can a $450 vacuum not last six month before it's worn out??! Again buyer beware!! I'm going to get a Miele!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is the best vacuum cleaner I have ever used. It's easy to use, connect different heads, love the cord rewind and easy to clean the canniser and filter. When you look into the see tru conister and see what dirt was picked up - it will astound you.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Iannone

customer_reviews.title: Operating Manuel
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on use of this product are very hard to decifer. Cartoon style instructions are ridiculous. I would prefer better pictures with explicit language as to how to assemble the machine's various parts also how to maintain the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Love it, plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: Love it, plain and simple. Easy to move around, light weight and powerful. The unit is very easy to assemble and dissamble for storage and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: James Blanch

customer_reviews.title: It turned out to be my favorite vacume cleaner of my whole life
customer_reviews.text: It turned out to be my favorite vacume cleaner of my whole life. And it gets an amazing amount of dog hair and dirt off my floors that don't even appear that dirty. So yeah, everyone should buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Zeh

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and reliable. Portable and great on all sorts of surfaces. A high tech machine of high quality material. Great.
customer_reviews.author: George Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to handle and the suction is amazingly strong!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have dyson for many years ago, they are great, I love them! This one is a little bit better as my two older one, because the handling is so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gößmann

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I thought the canister would be lighter and easier to move around but found it to be more work. LIke the stand up much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC39 Multi floor canister vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Light weight, works on both carpet and floor, easy to get under and around things. Much better than my last vacuum which was heavy and awkward and hard to get into places. Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC39
customer_reviews.text: Dyson D39 is great for fine dust. Clogs easily with paper etc the size of a quarter. Still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. 10 times better than the "Rainbow" canister we had before it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: See in person before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction! All attachments are cheaply made. the attachments are connected to the hose and the on/ off switch is on canister which is bad location.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Keeling

customer_reviews.title: great suction
customer_reviews.text: Product is all is says it is. Would like to get the hair attachment. Would recommend to others. The payment was easy and the item was delivered on time as committed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to maneuver. Good suction power and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Does a great job picking up. To be so compact, the tank is a little small so you have to empty it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kessinger

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen vacuum cleaner as good as Dyson, It picks anything comes in his way. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ravipal Atwal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the laminated floor, very handy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: frichet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think dyson inventions are awesome. I did get the hardwood floor attachment too. Lovin it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mohler

product_meta.title: Dyson DC39 Multi floor canister vacuum cleaner - Clearance
product_meta.description: Dyson DC39 Multi floor canister vacuum cleaner - Clearance.
feature_bullets: 5 year parts & labor warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller
Dyson cyclone technology captures more dirt and mircoscopic dust than any other with no loss of suction
Radial Root Cyclone technology- airflows remodeled to maximize suction power
Turns on a dime for greater control
Triggerhead tool- the only turbine head controlled at the handle means no bending down to adjust from carpets to hard floors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars400 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
